website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed, comfortable shoe for all day wear. A good choice if your occupation keeps you on your feet.
pros: Excellent arch support and attractive appearance
Micro G shock resistance and traction works well for runners or if you spend all day on your feet
cons: You may need to use the heel lock or wear longer socks to prevent rubbing on your ankles

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Comfy shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, super comfy. Happy with my purchase! I want a second pair! I've always had good luck with Under Armour shoes. They fit well and they don't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thein

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with feet problems
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two pairs of these shoes over the past couple years, and I absolutely love them. I had foot surgery several years ago, so I have to be careful to buy shoes with good arch support. These are comfortable and they look good. My only complaint would be the color. The pair I bought a couple years ago were more of a light teal color. The current color is closer to neon green, which I don't like as much. But these are great shoes and even with my foot problems I can wear them comfortably for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Quackiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, esp. through the toes. There is a band that stretches across the top and squeezes my toes. So these shoes do not work for me. Also the insole has minor cushioning, I like a little more softness and give in the insole. The shoe overall seemed a little on the cheap side.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Looks great although I was disappointed that they are not as comfortable as I was hoping for. After wearing the 1st time I thought maybe they needed to be broken in but after several wears they are not any better. I was on the treadmill yeterday and after 30 minutes I had to out my old sneakers back on. Sadly this was $60 wasted as Ill probobaly only wear them for quick trips running around.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyone

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, LOVE them. They are a little narrow but not enough to feel uncomfortable. I do have a wider foot so instead of going with the 10.5, I went with the 11 and it fits beautifully. Literally perfect. The shoe itself looks just like it does in the picture, no color distortiins or anything. I have big feet and like that the shoe doesn't make your foot look huge. They feel extremely comfortable, have good shock resistance (such a fan of the micro G for this). I haven't tried a full run on the streets yet but running on the treadmill and workouts in the gym are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: NessaGee

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable!! There is a lot of walking involved with my job so I look for a shoe that can provide all day comfort and hold up with the amount of wear they'll get. These were my first pair of UnderArmour shoes and they definitely exceeded my expectations. I would recommend giving them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Stejenni

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch and these work fine. I like the width at the ball of the foot and the mesh that lets my feet breathe. This is my 3rd pair and will continue to buy this brand and type. The first pair lasted about 2 or three years with lots of use. I found that memory foam did not work for my feet, so if you like memory foam, this shoe is not for you. I wear a size 6.
customer_reviews.author: tmhite

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy shoe - great support for athlete
customer_reviews.text: Very strudy - great quality shoe. My teenage daughter is an athlete and goes through shoes more than anyone I have ever known. She is a competitive tennis player so she is constantly getting holes in the toe/top front area and it is a never ending battle. These have the reinforced toe that are the hard leather so I am hoping they last a little longer. We have been pretty loyal to the asics brand for shoes, but as of a week out, these seem to be holding there own (I initially just purchased them because they were cheap and the color was cute) What a great surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, all around great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! They are so comfortable, and super cute! I did pay attention to the reviews, and they do run a little small. I went up a half size (usually wear 6.5, got a 7), and they fit perfectly. They have a good amount of cushion, but do not feel too bouncy. I also like the wider toe box, room to breathe or for swelling if you are in them for several hours at a time. I have worn them for a long walk, partially through rough terrain, and they were great. I will likely buy another pair, because I like to have separate workout and everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CNW

customer_reviews.title: It's True, They Do Run Small!!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews said they ran a little small, but I am 7.5 and tend to buy size 8 shoes. I bought these in 8 and one of the shoes definitely feels small (even though my feet are the same length and I've never had this problem with any other shoe). They are hard and don't have much cushion. I bought them as walking shoes but haven't worn them at all because of their stiffness. It's like 20 years ago when you bought shoes and had to wear them in before they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Critter

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love Under Armour Sneakers. I have owned several pairs and different types. They are always comfortable with no break in time. These ones were a little heavier than my last pair but still super comfy. Great for running and everyday wear. They do not resist water at all though! Your feet will be soaked with even a little rain. I have a wide splay foot and the toe box on these is very comfortable. No rubbing or chafing on my outer toes.
customer_reviews.author: ESPY

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. I ordered my normal size and I figured they'd be snug but I've warn them for a couple of hours and they have loosened up very nicely! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: jensen atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Will not last, no protection in toe box.
customer_reviews.text: Top too thin, no thicker lining on the inside like some micro g pairs own, i tend to rip holes in active shoes with big toe, this shoe wont last if you drag and kick your big toe a lot. Always get a full size bigger in UA shoes, when you run feet get pumped, swell a bit, Im 7.5 in most shoes, sometimes 7, in UA always get 8.5 and a gel insole to raise the heel up and prevent blisters bottom soles and back heel. When you get exact size in US toe box stitching ends up cutting into toe nail with each step, suggest to go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable pair of running shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable pair of running shoes I've ever worn. So long Nike. Under Armour is my new brand.
customer_reviews.author: April Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfortable, but order half a size up
customer_reviews.text: I am a true 7.5 but always ordered half a size up in Nike sneakers. I did the same with the Under Armour sneakers and they fit perfectly. I have a wide foot but ordered the regular width (B)M and I have no complaints whatsoever, the toe area is nice and wide and very comfortable. No pressure points and also no break in time was needed. I found my new favorite walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: The "grey" is more of a blue-grey
customer_reviews.text: The "grey" is more of a blue-grey. I may send them back for this reason only. This is my 3rd pair of Under Armor running shoes--I've literally worn my others until the tread was bare. They are great shoes for running & light hiking. But the color of this "grey" shoe is a little too "blue" for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tegge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hour shifts and am on my feet a lot. After the first night my feet felt AMAZING! Usually I bring my old shoes to switch out halfway thru my shift as I break in new shoes, but these shoes are wonderful! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: love these sheos
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my favorite pair of sneakers ever. I usually don't like this type of shoe but these look very high quality and I love the color combo it goes great with dark jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Laladyley

customer_reviews.title: No more pain!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair (different color). I bought these again because I don’t have back/knee issues anymore while running. I feel like this model of shoe has helped me overcome my running pains. I run more often, longer distances, and still no pain. I truly believe it is because of this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Zero Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: No arch support at all. Completely flat insole. Not a good idea for running or even walking. Google plantar fasciitis which is what you get from complete lack of arch support.
customer_reviews.author: D. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers feel great on my feet. This is my first ever pair of UA. I take an 8.5 but ordered 9 (like I do for all shoes I'm going to workout in) and they fit beautifully. They look great and grip well to the gym floor. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SfK

customer_reviews.title: very light weight and comfortable. I wear them while using the treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size, very light weight and comfortable. I wear them while using the treadmill, recumbent bike & elliptical machine as well as walking and doing light work around the farm. will be ordering a second pair to have on hand as backups! Under Armour has never been a disappointment!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Archer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes no longer available
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour Micro G assert 6 Running shoes are the best fit shoes for me, however, looked like they discontinued making them. This was the third pair I’ve purchased. I usually wear size 8 but no longer could find them. I purchased a pair of 8.5, it still fit better than other brands/styles. I hope that I can find as good running shoes As these ones in the market in future.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sung

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My jogging greatly improved, knee pain went away and the shoes weathered well through HIIT, and Shred classes. No blisters:) Great arch support and stability looking forward to using them in Step and CrosssFit.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them....
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give underarmour sneakers 1 star, but these are not comfortable. This is my 3rd pair of UA sneakers, and I have been trying to break them in for 2 months now, but it’s just not working. My feet hurt. I had to switch to Nike’s, as that’s all my local store carried, and they were much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. I ordered the size I usually wear and they fit perfect. They are very comfortable without any break in time and look great. They arrived in 2 days as promised. The only thing I didn't like was that they were shipped in a plastic bag. I like to keep all of my shoes in their shoe box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work shoes. I’m in the medical field, so I’m constantly up and down, and I spend a lot of my day on my feet- standing and walking around. I typically wear a size 9, so I ordered a 9 and they fit exactly as expected. They’re super cute and comfortable with great support!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: But they felt great. They are true to size
customer_reviews.text: Ive been wearing these sneakers for about three weeks. I recd them the morning of my zumba class. I was nervous to wear them. But they felt great. They are true to size. For my ladies with bigger shoe size they carry uo to size 12. Im a size 11 so i know the heartache. My one complaint i started running again and they feel a little heavy. Other than that i highly recommend them and would buy another pair. Not too mention they look good an get a lot complimenta on them. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneal

customer_reviews.title: I like this brand because I do not have a narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size. I like this brand because I do not have a narrow foot. I do with the back of the shoe didn't come up so high. I have to pull the back up every time I put them on. I'm afraid this is going to wear the fabric out quickly exposing my heal to the plastic piece which can will rub. I had this problem with the last shoe's I received from them.
customer_reviews.author: RachaellJB

customer_reviews.title: I love the look
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very fashionable. I love the look. However upon wearing them the back never loosened and digs into my back. When I run my feet were immediately in pain. I attributed it To being new and having to break in but after a few weeks of constant use the pain continued. I now only wear to run errand and not work out. They are good if just for a “look” but not for a true run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They’re comfortable. My only complaint is that compared to Other shoes I feel like the heel part folds down easily as I’m putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: These run small!
customer_reviews.text: The three star rating is for sizing, the shoes were great. I ordered these in my normal size (10 C/D). They were simply too short. I like the style and color so am returning these and have ordered a larger pair, through UA as I couldnt find them on Amazon in an 11.
customer_reviews.author: heybam

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. I always buy more expensive under armour shoes and love them, however I wanted that color so I took a chance..big mistake..the top of my foot hurts really bad in these. I had to take them off while I was driving.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsue1

customer_reviews.title: Poor Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7.5 in sneakers. UA sneakers run a little small so I usually order an 8. This particular sneaker had very poor arch support compared to the UA sneakers I normally order, so I use my custom insoles in these.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with fit & color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I love the color! I read previous reviews and took the recommendation to order the next size up as the fit of this shoe runs small. I usually wear a size 7.5 so I ordered a size 8. Great fit and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers they are lightweight and very comfortable.I waited to write this review to see how i liked them after a few months. I'm on my feet 9-10 hours a day as a nurse and these have really lived up to it. That being said its almost time for a new pair but I definitely got my money's worth. Not to mention they are a super cute shoe and they arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Murgolo

customer_reviews.title: too narrow
customer_reviews.text: bummed. I decided to get a different color than the usual blue ones I have bought in the past. Same size, same shoe, different color. These ones are too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: teri s

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked these out but could not wear them due to the fit (she's flat footed)... so I inherited them! I wear them everyday to work. Fit nice, sturdy, retain shape, size is accurate. I wipe them clean once a week and they still look brand new after a couple months. I have never ordered Under Armour gym shoes before, but they have gained a life long customer now. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker, fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sneaker emergently while on vacation, at chose "same day delivery" to our hotel, which luckily was available. This sneaker fit perfectly, true to size and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SweetLife

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy!! Found my new workout shoes...normally order Nike’s but I really like these! I wear a size 9 but I ordered a size 10 just to be safe & I am glad that I did! Will order another pair again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I did buy these a 1/2 size larger than I normally wear (because of other reviews) and they fit perfectly. Very comfortable and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer paramedic

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased at all with these tennisshoes
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased at all with these tennisshoes, they are hard and poor support. I wanted to try something different. I have used running shoes by Brooks (Ghost style) and they are so awesome but expensive. I expected more. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McMurray

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shoe! Firm and cushioned. The heel support is great! Using this for a gym shoe. Got a great price!
customer_reviews.author: AprilD1

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe!! I love UA running shoes. I have tried others just to end up regretting the money wasted. Plenty of toe space and fits well in the heel. Light weight yet still supportive during a run and this shoe can transition to less intense exercise without being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DRoss

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! They are the only style I like and so wear them all day at work and my feet NEVER get sore.
customer_reviews.author: Ben F

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like these for running indoors. The first few days I did have some sore ankles which I just figured was due to them being new shoes. I do think I should have read a little more about arch support, as I do have very high arches. Overall though I would say that these are a great pair of gym shoes. I have yet to try them outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly small!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe, but they fit differently than some of my other Under Armour shoes. I got the same size but they are so snug that they make my feet fall asleep when on a treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: toyjessie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They run small, but I feel like all Under Armour products do. So I bought a size up from what I wear in other brands. But otherwise it's the perfect shoe! Definitely buying more in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair of these that I purchased at the store and love them so much that I bought another pair off Amazon! Extremely comfortable shoes and I think they're super cute!
customer_reviews.author: NicoleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I bought the same size and style as a pair I got at a sporting goods store a while back because I liked them so much. They are the real deal and fit just as my first pair. This is a great price for them as well. I do a lot of walking with my dogs and they are very comfortable for that.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Helm

customer_reviews.title: They last and are comfortable. I walk 6 - 10 miles a day ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Under Armour shoes. They last and are comfortable. I walk 6 - 10 miles a day at work on concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy J. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Patient works in gymnastics only person I know on her feet more than I. Said these were best shoes ever. I bought a pair. Have to replace every 2-3 due to wear and tear....but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Luanna

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Comfortable, fits as expected. Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair thus far. Love them for working out, walking and even with jeans
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the look of the shoe but run a little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice/Lightweight/Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. First time I've purchased UnderArmor athletic shoes. I'm pleased. They are supportive and comfortable. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Blsdxs2

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I lobe these shoes. They are good for running and gym use. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Run a tad small.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these but they are on the smaller size. I always wear 7.5 and they are usually loose on my. These are tight but fit good with thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Blodgett Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Love Me Some UA Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Under Armour shoes and I'm not just sold, I'm spoiled. They're so comfy, light and shaped just right. I'm not a great runner, so I need a great shoe, and this one's it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Loved my shoes then and still do now. I will order again and again. They fit better than the ones I went and tried on..lol
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Light weight, very comfortable. This is the second pair of Under Armour Micro G's I have purchased and I like them a lot. I walk 2.5 miles a day, so they get a good workout. The provide enough support without being bulky or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Thursday night book club reader

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfortable and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable that I hurried and bought a 2nd pair for the future. I do a lot of walking, jogging, and hiking so comfort and size are everything for me. My feet love under armour and these shoes fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Janeice D.

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great color, fits the wife well, and she has commented several times how incredibly comfy they are. These were her first pair of UA sneakers, and I think she likes them more than her normal Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: All Computer Services

customer_reviews.title: True fan !
customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers out there! I used to wear nike but underarmour has much better ankle support. Haven’t gone back since! Underarmour forever
customer_reviews.author: Maria Di Bello

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light weight! Only issue that I have is that the heel is very tall on my foot and very stiff. It tends to rub unless I have socks that go up high enough... so no shows are kind of out of the question. This could be a big problem come summer time, but for now it is ok. Maybe they will break down after a while?
customer_reviews.author: lil red

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me these for Christmas and they are gorgeous and fit perfect. In Nikes I'm an 8.5M and in these I'm also an 8.5M. I got the black/Turquoise pair and they are exactly as pictured 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Breider

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They fit true to size, light weight and don’t need long to break in. I was always a loyal ASICS fan, but these shoes have impressed me so much they are quickly becoming my favorite shoe to run in.
customer_reviews.author: Vikingsentry

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great quality and nice looking, but the back of it was too high for my ankles. I had to insert orthothics in them otherwise they kept on cutting the back of my ankle as I walked. They might be ok for someone with think ankles is my guess.
customer_reviews.author: Light Search

customer_reviews.title: Buy Now
customer_reviews.text: So awesome i have a skinny foot with a wide width in toe area and a high arch under armour is the Best shoe for that kind of foot!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie7

customer_reviews.title: Could be better. Not as soft and comfy as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Could be better. Not as soft and comfy as I hoped. I am a typical 8 1/2. These shoes run a little bit tight. The break-in. If there is one, seems a little long. They look nice. But they’re not exactly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KathAnnon

customer_reviews.title: Too small and no arch support
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of these shoes from two or three years ago, and I've loved them. The new pair felt like they fit half-to-one size too small AND they had NO arch support! I don't know what happened to the manufacturing of these shoes recently, but I'm very disappointed to send them back. However, if you don't need arch support, and can get the right size, these are still awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes, Beets, Battlestar Galactica
customer_reviews.text: Rolf is my best friend. We met at a shoe store. I heard him asking for a shoe that could increase his speed and not leave any tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but NOT AS MUCH SUPPORT AS THE LEATHER ONES
customer_reviews.text: OKAY, but NOT AS MUCH SUPPORT AS THE LEATHER ONES
customer_reviews.author: My Truths

customer_reviews.title: First and only pair of Under Armour sneakers I will ever own
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is attractive, but I otherwise hate it. I have had repeated foot pain since wearing these, including sharp pain in the heels. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit to break in
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color and look of these shoes, they fit really well except they have taken me a little while to break in. I assume that's because I usually don't wear running shoes. Overall they fit great and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: inmindseye

customer_reviews.title: Love my shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort of these shoes! Because I have other UA shoes, I knew to buy a half size larger. Great look!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, goes with most things. Reason I ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe, goes with most things. Reason I gave it 4 stars is I wish it had just a bit more padding. Would not be a shoe I would run in, but they are ok for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Woerz

customer_reviews.title: 5th pair
customer_reviews.text: The only shoe for me. Most new shoes I need to break in a little bit as I would always get a small blister on my heel. Not with these shoes. Right out of the box you could run forever. I only wear for walking and light jogging. I love the way they look and love the way they fit. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nike
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It has good support. Better than my old Nike. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were for my granddaughter who, unfortunately, has flat feet. She says her feet do not hurt after wearing the Under Armour shoes all day at school....great arch support!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I work 12 hours day and they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Majda

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half a size bigger based on reviews and they fit perfectly. Very comfortable for working out in both a studio and outdoors. Also very well priced. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: That's are great. I have worn them till they have holes. Will be buying another pair to replace my old ones. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hampton

customer_reviews.title: I don't like neon.
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity of the black and white with just the right touch of pink! My favorite running shoes hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing shoes!!! Super comfortable, my feet don't get too hot, and they match just about anything. Perfect for my 12 hr shifts in the ER. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m super picky about my foot wear. Purchased these on the fly and man I am glad I did! Very comfy, not to light and not super heavy. Highly recommend and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Mommato3

customer_reviews.title: Great for kickboxing! But not a running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great for kickboxing and training, but not good for running.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are actually my 3rd pair. They look nice. Great price for awesome quality. Very comfortable fit to size
customer_reviews.author: silencewaits

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable! I have a narrow foot and they fit like a glove. The toe box is exactly how I like it
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed in this athletic shoe, they run small and do not offer much support. They feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gerweck

customer_reviews.title: The fit was fine. The left shoe feels much different
customer_reviews.text: The fit was fine. The left shoe feels much different... It might be a defective pair. When I walk in them it feels like there is a lump on the sole of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Musicgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe, durable and comfortable. Fit as advertised. Have purchased several pair now, due to how happy I was with the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G

customer_reviews.title: great shoes. Not as pricy as the other Under ...
customer_reviews.text: great shoes. Not as pricy as the other Under armor shoes, but fully functions as a wonderful pair for runners. I am runner and always buys Under Armor shoes. This is the cheapest pair that I have so far, but functions very well for my daily run
customer_reviews.author: Yufang H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I tried them on in a store then bought them online. They provide very good support yet are lightweight. I wear them to zumba and do not have any issues with them. Will be purchasing another pair in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: tweetsmom

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I bought them for work, and they are great. my feet feel supported and they are very comfortable. They did take a minute to break in, but after that they feel great on my feet. They fit as expected, so get the size that you normal would get. I really like these shoes. The colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Tread coming off
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for work. I've worn them 3 weeks at my new job and the black part of tread is coming off the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Too tight at ankle
customer_reviews.text: Wore these twice and the gave me bad blisters on both of my ankles. Would not buy again. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: L. Keith

customer_reviews.title: My wife is very happy with her purchase !
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her new shoes I told her to shop here you can find exactly what you want
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  piscura

customer_reviews.text: They don't fit according to their size. Otherwise nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: Fiance Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: Fiance loves these shoes and they look great on her
customer_reviews.author: AMcDonald

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Micro G Assert 6 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Upper uses light, supportive foam underneath a soft layer of breathable mesh. Durable leather overlays for stability that locks in your midfoot. Full-length EVA sock liner for added comfort & a custom fit. Full-length Micro Gfoam turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs. Strategically placed rubber traction covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight . Non-marking rubber outsole delivers greater traction with less weight. Offset: 10 mm. Weight: 9.0 oz.

Durable leather overlays for stability that locks in your midfoot
